attributes.action: Include the question of sexual orientation in the 2011 census
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Include the question of sexual orientation in the 2011 census."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14688.asp

Prime Minister's Office
